profile_positions.description:
Operated backend HR-SAP System for Kraft US market for 52,000 employees

Processed 52,000 employees for 10 payroll areas with numerous Off Cycle Runs.

Become part of transition team and GO Live.

Mass uploads - Processing mass loads for payments or deduction requests for employees’ off-cycle and on-cycle payments. Mass loading of tax adjustments especially for year-end processing. Mass uploads in SAP using WinShuttle software.

 System testing – Testing of configurations made in the system before it is being transported into production.

 Data inputs – Processing requests for payments or deductions in the system for employees.

 Manual check requests – Processing off-cycle payments to employees that were not included in the regular on-cycle payroll. 

 Stop payments, bank returns and rejects, checks replacement – Processing requests for stop payments. Administration of everyday reports of deposits being rejected by the bank and re-processing them for payment. 

 Pioneered overpayments processing – Recoupment of money overpaid to employees. This includes:

• Overpayment investigation
• Validation of an overpayment report
• Processing of correction in the system
• Claims clearing in the system
• Computation of net overpayment
• Preparation of overpayment letter to notify the employees
• Processing repayments and adjustments in the system

 Issue resolution - Addressing payroll issues/concerns and disputes from employees.

 Pioneered a payroll account in IBM - Have been a part of the pioneering team for a Payroll system transformation (from UPPS system to SAP-HR).

 Have been exposed to critical situations and special projects under Payroll transformation processes
